typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderDate as string,
		Region as string,
		Rep as string,
		Item as string,
		Units as string,
		{Unit Cost} as string,
		Total as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
